author: LarsFosdal

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @LarsFosdal Please move your request to PowerShellGet repository.

comments.author: LarsFosdal
comments.body: Umm... I apologize for the stupid question: How do I do that?

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: You could close the issue and create new there.

comments.author: LarsFosdal
comments.body:
Ah, like that.  Well, there appears to be two PowerShellGet repositories.
Which one is the right one?

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
I think https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShellGet. That is new 3.0.
GitHub
PowerShell/PowerShellGet
PowerShellGet is the Package Manager for PowerShell - PowerShell/PowerShellGet

comments.author: LarsFosdal
comments.body: Moved. Feel free to remove this thread if desired.

title: Feature Request: Update-Module without parameters should identify module/repository
